chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
m: nat
n: nat
f: nat -> nat -> nat
g: nat -> nat

Goal:
(forall i j : nat, j < i < n -> exists k : nat, k < m /\ f i j ≲ g k) -> msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => msum nat_join 0 i (f i)) ≲ msum nat_join 0 m g

Premises:
msum : forall X : Type, (X -> X -> X) -> X -> nat -> (nat -> X) -> X
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
nat_join = fun n m : nat => ⟦ ⟬ n ⟭ ↑ ⟬ m ⟭ ⟧ : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments nat_join (_ _)%nat_scope
nat_joins_binary_le : forall (n m : nat) (f g : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, i < n -> exists j : nat, j < m /\ f i ≲ g j) -> msum nat_join 0 n f ≲ msum nat_join 0 m g
nat_joins_binary_le_right : forall (m n : nat) (f : nat -> nat), (exists i : nat, i < n /\ m ≲ f i) -> m ≲ msum nat_join 0 n f
nat_joins_binary_le_left : forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> nat) (m : nat), msum nat_join 0 n f ≲ m < -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i ≲ m)
msum_msum : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n k : nat) (f : nat -> nat -> X), (forall i1 j1 i2 j2 : nat, i1 < n -> j1 < k -> i2 < n -> j2 < k -> m (f i1 j1) (f i2 j2) = m (f i2 j2) (f i1 j1)) -> msum m u n (fun i : nat => msum m u k (f i)) = msum m u k (fun j : nat => msum m u n (fun i : nat => f i j))
sum_power_lt : forall (k n : nat) (f : nat -> nat), k <> 0 -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < k) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power i k) < power n k
msum_mscal : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n k : nat) (f : nat -> X), (forall i j : nat, i < n -> j < n -> m (f i) (f j) = m (f j) (f i)) -> msum m u n (fun i : nat => mscal m u k (f i)) = mscal m u k (msum m u n f)
nat_meet_joins_distr_l : forall (m n : nat) (f : nat -> nat), m ⇣ msum nat_join 0 n f = msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => m ⇣ f i)
msum_sum : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n : nat) (f g : nat -> X), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> m (f j) (g i) = m (g i) (f j)) -> msum m u n (fun i : nat => m (f i) (g i)) = m (msum m u n f) (msum m u n g)
msum_only_one : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> X) (i : nat), i < n -> (forall j : nat, j < n -> i <> j -> f j = u) -> msum m u n f = f i
power_decomp_lt : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a : nat -> nat) (q : nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < q) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) < power q p
power_decomp_unique' : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a b : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> b i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => b i * power (f i) p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> a i = b i
power_decomp_unique : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a b : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> b i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => b i * power (f i) p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> a i = b i
msum_ext : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X) (n : nat) (f g : nat -> X), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i = g i) -> msum m u n f = msum m u n g
power_decomp_is_digit : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (a f : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> rel_iter.is_digit (∑ n (fun i0 : nat => a i0 * power (f i0) p)) p (f i) (a i)
sum_0n_mono : forall (n : nat) (f g : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i <= g i) -> ∑ n f <= ∑ n g
power_decomp_factor : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, 0 < i < S n -> f 0 < f i) -> ∑ (S n) (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => a (S i) * power (f (S i) - f 0 - 1) p) * power (S (f 0)) p + a 0 * power (f 0) p
msum_ends : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), (forall i : nat, 0 < i <= n -> f i = u) -> msum m u (n + 2) f = m (f 0) (f (S n))
sum_0n_scal_r : forall (n k : nat) (f : nat -> nat), ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * k) = ∑ n f * k
msum_of_unit : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i = u) -> msum m u n f = u
sum_0n_scal : forall (X : Type) (sum : X -> X -> X) (zero : X), monoid_theory sum zero -> (forall x y : X, sum x y = sum y x) -> forall (n k : nat) (f : nat -> X), msum sum zero n (fun i : nat => mscal sum zero k (f i)) = mscal sum zero k (msum sum zero n f)
msum_first_two : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), 2 <= n -> (forall i : nat, 2 <= i -> f i = u) -> msum m u n f = m (f 0) (f 1)
rel_iter.is_digit = fun c q i y : nat => y < q /\ (exists a b : nat, c = (a * q + y) * power i q + b /\ b < power i q) : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments rel_iter.is_digit (_ _ _ _)%nat_scope
sum_0n_scal_l : forall (n k : nat) (f : nat -> nat), ∑ n (fun i : nat => k * f i) = k * ∑ n f
sum_0n_le_one : forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> nat) (i : nat), i < n -> f i <= ∑ n f
msum_comm : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (a : X) (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), (forall i : nat, i < n -> m (f i) a = m a (f i)) -> m (msum m u n f) a = m a (msum m u n f)
sum_0n_distr_in_out : forall (n : nat) (a b f : nat -> nat), ∑ n (fun i : nat => (a i + b i) * f i) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * f i) + ∑ n (fun i : nat => b i * f i)
msum_plus : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (a b : nat) (f : nat -> X), msum m u (a + b) f = m (msum m u a f) (msum m u b (fun i : nat => f (a + i)))
msum_0 : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X) (f : nat -> X), msum m u 0 f = u
msum_1 : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall f : nat -> X, msum m u 1 f = f 0
msum_fold_map : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X) (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), msum m u n f = fold_right m u (map f (list_an 0 n))
sum_0n_distr_l : forall (X : Type) (sum times : X -> X -> X) (zero one : X), monoid_theory sum zero -> (forall x u v : X, sum x u = sum x v -> u = v) -> monoid_theory times one -> (forall x y z : X, times x (sum y z) = sum (times x y) (times x z)) -> forall (b : X) (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), msum sum zero n (fun i : nat => times b (f i)) = times b (msum sum zero n f)
msum_S : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X) (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), msum m u (S n) f = m (f 0) (msum m u n (fun n0 : nat => f (S n0)))
binary_le_sind : forall P : nat -> nat -> SProp, (forall n : nat, P 0 n) -> (forall n m : nat, rem n 2 <= rem m 2 -> div n 2 ≲ div m 2 -> P (div n 2) (div m 2) -> P n m) -> forall n n0 : nat, n ≲ n0 -> P n n0
binary_le_ind : forall P : nat -> nat -> Prop, (forall n : nat, P 0 n) -> (forall n m : nat, rem n 2 <= rem m 2 -> div n 2 ≲ div m 2 -> P (div n 2) (div m 2) -> P n m) -> forall n n0 : nat, n ≲ n0 -> P n n0
sum_0n_distr_r : forall (X : Type) (sum times : X -> X -> X) (zero one : X), monoid_theory sum zero -> (forall x u v : X, sum x u = sum x v -> u = v) -> monoid_theory times one -> (forall x y z : X, times (sum y z) x = sum (times y x) (times z x)) -> forall (b : X) (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), msum sum zero n (fun i : nat => times (f i) b) = times (msum sum zero n f) b
Inductive binary_le : nat -> nat -> Prop := in_ble_0 : forall n : nat, 0 ≲ n | in_ble_1 : forall n m : nat, rem n 2 <= rem m 2 -> div n 2 ≲ div m 2 -> n ≲ m Arguments binary_le (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments in_ble_0 _%nat_scope Arguments in_ble_1 (_ _)%nat_scope
msum_unit : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall n : nat, msum m u n (fun _ : nat => u) = u
msum_plus1 : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), msum m u (S n) f = m (msum m u n f) (f n)
map_map : forall (A B C : Type) (f : A -> B) (g : B -> C) (l : list A), map g (map f l) = map (fun x : A => g (f x)) l
Newton_nat_S : forall a n : nat, power n (1 + a) = ∑ (S n) (fun i : nat => binomial.binomial n i * power i a)

``` 
intros i j H.
unfold msum, nat_join.
apply nat_joins_binary_le with (n := n) (f := (fun i : nat => msum nat_join 0 i (f i))) (m := (fun i : nat => msum nat_join 0 m (g i))).
- intros i1 H1. apply nat_joins_binary_le_right.
  exists j. split; auto.
- intros i1 j1 i2 j2 H1 H2 H3 H4.
  rewrite msum_msum.
  apply msum_msum; intros.
  apply H.
- intros i1 H1. apply nat_joins_binary_le_right.
  apply H.
```
